description.value:
You upgrade the vishkanyan venom you can apply with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Envenom] to moderate vishkanyan venom. Envenom's frequency becomes once per 10 minutes.

Moderate Vishkanyan Venom (level 9)

Frequency once per 10 minutes

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[3d6[poison]] damage (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[4d6[poison]] damage (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[5d6[poison]] damage (1 round)
